item.title: Unlocking Expressivity with OP_CAT
item.description: Explore the exciting world of Bitcoin development with our panel discussion on OpCat, a proposed upgrade that could significantly enhance Bitcoin’s functionality. Our experts break down the technical aspects of OpCat, explaining how this simple concatenation operation could enable powerful features like covenants, vaults, and more efficient transaction processing.
